verses.verse: In the year <WH8141> that the commander <WH8661> came <WH935> to Ashdod, <WH795> when Sargon <WH5623> the king <WH4428> of Assyria <WH804> sent <WH7971> him and he fought <WH3898> against Ashdod <WH795> and captured <WH3920> it,

at that time <WH6256> the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> through <WH3027> Isaiah <WH9198> the son <WH1121> of Amoz, <WH531> saying, <WH559> "Go <WH1980> and loosen <WH6605> the sackcloth <WH8242> from your hips, <WH4975> and take <WH2502> your shoes <WH5275> off <WH4480> your feet. <WH7272>" And he did <WH6213> so, <WH3651> going <WH1980> naked <WH6174> and barefoot. <WH3182>

And the Lord <WH3068> said, <WH559> "Even <WH9201> as My servant <WH5650> Isaiah <WH9198> has gone <WH1980> naked <WH6174> and barefoot <WH3182> three <WH7969> years <WH8141> as a sign <WH226> and token <WH4159> against <WH5921> Egypt <WH4714> and Cush, <WH3568>

so <WH3651> the king <WH4428> of Assyria <WH804> will lead <WH5090> away <WH5090> the captives <WH7628> of Egypt <WH4714> and the exiles <WH1546> of Cush, <WH3568> young <WH5288> and old, <WH2205> naked <WH6174> and barefoot <WH3182> with buttocks <WH8351> uncovered, <WH2834> to the shame <WH6172> of Egypt. <WH4714>
"Then they shall be dismayed <WH2865> and ashamed <WH954> because <WH4480> of Cush <WH3568> their hope <WH4007> and Egypt <WH4714> their boast. <WH8597>

"So the inhabitants <WH3427> of this <WH2008> coastland <WH339> will say <WH559> in that day, <WH3117> 'Behold, <WH2009> such <WH3541> is our hope, <WH4007> where <WH834> <WH8033> we fled <WH5127> for help <WH5833> to be delivered <WH5337> from the king <WH4428> of Assyria; <WH804> and we, how <WH349> shall we escape <WH4422>?'"
